hero.title: The Art of
hero.description: Experience the fusion of Moroccan tradition and modern clinical science. A sanctuary for your most delicate rituals.

features.title: Clinical Excellence
features.description: Scientifically formulated. Culturally rooted. We bridge the gap between ancient wisdom and modern dermatology.

dermatologist.title: Dermatologist Tested
dermatologist.description: Rigorous clinical testing ensures every formula is safe, pH-balanced, and hypoallergenic for the most sensitive skin.

organic.title: Organic Ingredients
organic.description: Sourced directly from Moroccan cooperatives. 100% natural origins, free from parabens, sulfates, and synthetic fragrances.

shipping.title: Discreet Shipping
shipping.description: Your privacy is paramount. All orders are delivered in unbranded, eco-friendly packaging with no external identifiers.

footer.description: Premier intimate wellness store in Morocco. Fast and discreet delivery.
